Invited speaker, "Recent data preprocessing techniques for data quality", organized by Ministry of Commerce on 9 October 2021. Trainer for "Optimization modeling", organized by SCG on 21 July 2021. Invited speaker for "Apply learning to time series analysis from human expert to automation using data" in DPSTCon 2021 on 9 July 2021. Invited speaker for "AI-ML-DL", organized by Rajavithi Hospital, 7 February 2020. Invited speaker for "Publishing in International Journal", organized by Thammasart University, 7 January 2020. Senior Project 2019 Savinee Mueangsap, The study of special ordered sets for the column generation technique to solve a workload balancing crew rostering problem, Faculty of Science, Chulalongkorn University.
